Edges-Power -- Male Human Novice Wizard
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d4 Strength: d4 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/any armor or shield
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Science: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d10
Notice: (sma) d6 Riding: (agi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Celestial; Common
Skill Notes:
Armor Interference: -4 Spellcasting and Agility-based skills w/any armor or shield
Bad Eyes+: -2 on visual trait rolls
Bonded Object: +1 Spellcasting when object held or worn
Size: 0 Deity: Erastil
Advances: 1 Improvement Points: 6 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 2; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (3 points): Arcane Armor; Bonded Object; Wizard Hindrances: Bad Eyes+; Driven; Enemy Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Bond: +1 Edge Points (Bonded Object or Familiar)
Wizard: Has Arcane Background (Wizard), Arcane Bond, Armor Interference, School, and Spellbook features
Driven: Decisions are affected by personal goal
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
School: May select specialist school (free casting reroll) and two opposition schools (-2 casting rolls)
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Starknife (d4+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Starknife Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Blind: (2 PP) R10" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd)
Shape Change: (3+ PP) RSelf Transforms into animal form for 5 rd
Speak Language: (1 PP) R10" Target speaks unknown language for 10 min
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Wizard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Armor: May cast spells in light armor w/out penalty
Spellbook: Must study bonded arcane book daily to cast spells
